EmailTemplate.subject: Quote Requested {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell and your interest in our products. We have received and processed your request for quote and are attaching the quote for your review. Please review the document carefully for any added information provided for your reference including dates and any item specific notes.
Unfortunately, we are unable to quote one or more part numbers from your request as they have been licensed or divested to a 3rd party. Please see the information below for further contact information on the licensed/divested part(s).
< Replace with/Insert Part Number>
< Insert Contact information, Refer to KA Licensed/Divested Parts for Detail>
At this time, we are going to close out this request. Please do not hesitate to contact us for any future inquiries.
Thank you and best regards,
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
